participant_abstract.sent: In this introductory meeting, led by the project manager we firstly got properly introduced to each other and our roles in the project.
We discussed the various stages that will take place in the project finished by laying down some initial ideas regarding the design.

These included our experiences regarding remote controls, concentrating more on what we disliked, or had in the past found anyoying about them, and then suggested a few, admittedly quite vauge ideas of how these could be improved upon.

participant_actions.sent: Personally I will be considering the working design phase.
Unfortunately I don't believe we went into to much discussion what other people would be doing or possibly i can't remember!

participant_decisions.sent: Decision made that we would consider this a just a TV remote (ie. not for video etc.) unless we are later told otherwise. decision to meet again after 30 mins.

participant_problems.sent: Perhaps a lack of background knowledge on the topic, however it was only an introductory meeting so this could be expected.
